metadata.title: CVE-2024-33900 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** KeePassXC 2.7.7 allows an attacker (who has the privilegesof the victim) to recover cleartext credentials via a memory dump. NOTE:the vendor disputes this because memory-management constraints make thisunavoidable in the current design and other realistic designs.

criterions.comment: keepassxc package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
